column2: select top # p.objID, p.ra, p.dec, p.petroMag_r-extinction_r AS mag_r,  p.petroR5#_r, p.deVRad_r, s.z AS RedShift, #E5/#*s.z AS DH_Mpc, p.petroMag_r-extinction_r-#*log1#(#E+# * s.z) AS AbsMag_r from galaxy AS p, dbo.fgetNearByObjEq(#,#,#) AS n, galSpecInfo AS s where p.objid=n.objid and p.specObjID=s.specObjID and p.specObjID<># and s.z>#
